code: import React from'react';import'./GameRules.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GameRules=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"rules",className:"game-rules-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"How to Play Andar Bahar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ol",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"A single card is placed face up in the center of the table.
